name: Sandro Etalle
content: Home Page of Sandro Etalle Founder of the Security group and Startup Coach at the Technical University of Eindhoven Investor, Advisor, Board Member, VC (key man of CYSERO and Advisor of Curiosity VC) Not too long ago: co-founder, CEO and later Chairman of the Board of SecurityMatters, a 4TU spin-off, which has been acquired by ForeScout. I have a passion for entrepreneurship and for computer security. My current research interest include network intrusion detection, protection of industrial control systems and trust management. Innovation and main projects The Eindhoven Security Hub is a Security Operations Center we started in cooperation with Fontys, Kembit, Intermax and BDO. It is a place where excellent researchers work together with excellent professionals. INTERSCT. "Towards an Internet of Secure Things" is a public private partnership bringing together 11 knowledge/education/research institutions (TU/e, VU, TUD, UT, RU, UvT, TNO [CSR, ESI], NSCR, Fontys, HvA, HL), and a large number of private organisations to tackle the problem of IoT security. INTERSECT is funded by the Dutch National Research Council (Grant NWA.1162.18.301) and more than 20 private organisations. Of course there is also an INTERSCT. LinkedIn page I am actively involved in the startup world and I regularly assist/coach students who want to start their own company. Reach out to me if you are starting a new venture. FAQ (please read this before contacting me!) Requirements and procedure for doing an external master thesis at the Security Group. Important! How to join the security group at the TU/e.
